Package ides.api.core

Class Hub

  • java.lang.Object
    • ides.api.core.Hub
  • public class Hub
extends java.lang.Object
    The main hub of the program. Serves to get references to all objects of interest (such as settings, main window, loaded resources, etc.) Plugins are encouraged to make use of these services.

    • Method Detail

      • string

        public static java.lang.String string​(java.lang.String key)
        Gets from the resource bundle stringResource the string which corresponds to the given key. Should be used for any messages and strings to appear in IDES (FIXME: save for the commmands which are managed by an external library?).
        Parameters:
        key - lookup key for the string
        Returns:
        the string corresponding to the key
        See Also:
        stringResource

      • addResouceBundle

        public static void addResouceBundle​(java.util.ResourceBundle bundle)
        Adds a string resource bundle to the set of bundles which are used to look up strings. Can be used by plugins to add their own string bundles at startup.
        Parameters:
        bundle - the string resource bundle to be added
        See Also:
        stringResource, string(String)

      • getPersistentData

        public static PersistentProperties getPersistentData()
        Provides access to a list of settings which persist over sessions.
        Returns:
        the list of persistent settings

      • storePersistentData

        public static void storePersistentData()
        Stores the settings from the list of settings getPersistentData() into the file settings.ini. If this fails, it shows a message box to the user.

      • getMainWindow

        public static java.awt.Frame getMainWindow()
        Gets the main window of IDES.
        Returns:
        the main window

      • getUserInterface

        public static UserInterface getUserInterface()
        Gets the main UI of IDES.
        Returns:
        the main UI of IDES

      • registerOptionsPane

        public static void registerOptionsPane​(OptionsPane pane)
        Register an options pane with the options dialog box. To be called just once per session for each options pane (e.g., when loading IDES or a plugin).
        Parameters:
        pane - the OptionsPane that will be registered
        See Also:
        OptionsPane, OptionsWindow

      • openOptionsPane

        public static void openOptionsPane​(java.lang.String title)
        Request that the options dialog box opens up on the screen and shows the options for the OptionsPane with the given title.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the OptionsPane to be displayed
        See Also:
        OptionsPane, OptionsWindow

      • displayAlert

        public static void displayAlert​(java.lang.String message)
        Displays a dialog box that shows an alert message to the user. Intended use is to announce errors and problems in an aesthetically-pleasing way.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be displayed

      • getCenteredLocationForDialog

        public static java.awt.Point getCenteredLocationForDialog​(java.awt.Dimension d)
        Suggests the position of the top-left corner for a dialog box with the given dimensions so that it is located in the center of the main window of the application.
        Parameters:
        d - the dimension of the dialog box
        Returns:
        the suggested position of the top-left corner of the dialog box

      • getWorkspace

        public static Workspace getWorkspace()
        Gets the main workspace.
        Returns:
        the main workspace

        Gets a resource from the IDES JAR file (icons and such).
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the resource
        Returns:
        URL that points to the resource

      • getLocalResource

        public static java.net.URL getLocalResource​(java.lang.Class<?> context,
                                            java.lang.String name)
        Gets a resource from the JAR file of a plugin (icons and such).
        Parameters:
        context - the context for the local resource (e.g., a class from the plugin)
        name - the name of the resource
        Returns:
        URL that points to the resource

      • getUserTextAnnotation

        public static java.lang.String getUserTextAnnotation​(DESModel model)
        Retrieve the user-defined text annotation of the given model. When the model is opened, the text appears in the "Annotations" tab.
        Parameters:
        model - the model
        Returns:
        the user-defined text annotation of the given model

      • setUserTextAnnotation

        public static void setUserTextAnnotation​(DESModel model,
                                         java.lang.String text)
        Set the user-defined text annotation of the given model. When the model is opened, the text appears in the "Annotations" tab.
        Parameters:
        model - the model
        text - the text of the annotation
